text: Robin Delta Automate Anything in Your Life with Claude Code (for non-technical people) 16K Most people think AI tools are only useful if you can code. That belief is already outdated. Claude Code quietly changes the rules, not by turning everyone into a programmer, but by letting non-engineers automate real work using plain language and simple commands. You just need to know what kind of work can be automated and how Claude Code fits into your daily flow. This article is about that. "Claude Code is Claude running next to your work, not inside a chat box. Instead of just answering questions, Claude Code can:"
